Plot: The true story of an Argentine family who lived with Josef Mengele without knowing his true identity, and of a girl who fell in love with one of the biggest criminals of all time.
Title: The German Doctor
Actors: Àlex Brendemühl, Natalia Oreiro, Diego Peretti, Elena Roger
tomatoConsensus: The German Doctor applies a refreshing level of restraint to its intriguing premise, and boasts solid performances from a talented cast.
